name: Mask 'Em
description:
Mask 'Em is a simple top down covid19 mask shooter made for the Epic MegaJam 2020. Player has to mask incoming people before they reach their target and be able to infect more people. 

Features

* Collect parts and place a auto masker which supports you for 30 seconds

* Mask covidiots for XP. Each level gives you move speed and additional fire rate

* Wash your hands frequently to avoid infection

* Beware of the night when the covidiot horde comes out

* Keep the incidence below 100

Controls

W/A/S/D: Movement

Mouse: Targeting

LMB: Mask

RMB: Place auto masker

ESC: Pause
